channel.title: FLF - Open Mike with Michael Thiessen
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.

item.title: Faithful Church Planting in an Unfaithful Age ft. Pastors Chase Davis & Matt Patrick [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ March 18, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Dr. Thiessen is joined by pastors Chase Davis and Matt Patrick of The Well Church in Boulder, Colorado, to discuss the politics of church planting and how to remain faithful in an unfaithful age. 

Episode Resource: The Well Church Website: https://www.boulderwell.org/; The Just Say It Podcast with Pastors Matt & Chase: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/just-say-it/id1654651469;
